pages.text: Devil-infused Yamazakura Blade eventually summoned the Devils again...$(br2)Devils devoured all the Yamazakura Blades, then killed all smiths who were there.$(br2)Though a long period, as long as a calendar cycle, had past, men of Tomihara were still difficult to defeat the Devils.

Humans finally slayed the Devils in a severe war with new strategy.$(br2)Devils' body became ashes, and left the only one Yamazakura Blade.$(br2)It was the leap month of the Lunar Calendar. So Humans named the only Yamazakura left "Yamazakura-Kamuy-", which means "Yamazakura, the Sacred Moon". This Blade became the only hope of Yamazakura Village, and the Tomihara State.

The War for Stealing Territory broke out.$(br2)The owner of Kamuy and the owner of Aoi, fight with the enemies together. They slayed uncountable amount of enemies with the stunt, Sakura-Space Quakke-.$(br2)As the records say, I have witnessed the real power of that stunt. When the"Heavy Rain" fell down, the Space was cut through.

As I know, Yamazakura's strong Spirit Power not only because the power of Devils, but also it is made by Spirit Sakura Steel, smelt from aerosiderites.$(br2)Tomihara was overthrown down after only a decade.$(br2)Owner of Kamuy and Aoi was assassinated, and the two Blades got lost. Bewitched Blades that smithed in Tomihara disappeared since then, only historical records about them were left.
I think the loss of Yamazakura Blades is a great pity indeed. The only thing I can do is trying to revivify the two Blades.$(br2)Though we have great power, we can hardly protect ourselves.
